about_the_game:
There's definitely some monkey business going on here! The new Gorilla Garage module is ready to bring the challenge to a whole new level of craziness!

This furious giant just can't stand those who leave the doors open and with noises, huffs and puffs - and big punches - is ready to fix the situation. So be careful when he raises his powerful arms, because right after he will hit the garage, closing the doors and blocking the passage! Timing and quick reflexes will be your winning weapons to tame his unstoppable fury.

Add some wild fun to your track with HOT WHEELS™ - Gorilla Garage Module!

This DLC is included in the HOT WHEELS™ Pass Vol. 2

This furious giant just can't stand those who leave the doors open and with noises, huffs and puffs - and big punches - is ready to fix the situation. So be careful when he raises his powerful arms, because right after he will hit the garage, closing the doors and blocking the passage! Timing and quick reflexes will be your winning weapons to tame his unstoppable fury.

Add some wild fun to your track with HOT WHEELS™ - Gorilla Garage Module!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8.1 64-Bit or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K / AMD FX-6350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 / GeForce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8.1 64-Bit or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-5820K / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 / Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

short_description: The new Gorilla Garage module will bring the challenge to a whole new level of craziness! Timing and quick reflexes are your winning weapons to tame this unstoppable fury. Add some wild fun to your track with HOT WHEELS™ - Gorilla Garage Module!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Korean
